timelineElements.title: Step 1
timelineElements.description: Build some basic fonctions of our applications, for example the landing page, management of authentification and develop a dashboard to aggregate notes and findings between pentesters

timelineElements.title: Step 2
timelineElements.description: Add legal form, identify scan automation and versioned log storage for traceability

timelineElements.title: Step 3
timelineElements.description: Develop a tool to log pentester scans, and actions during the tests, also build a C2
